18using UnityEngine;
19
20namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
21{
25 public class MetalPlate : MonoBehaviour
26 {
30 private Interactable _interactable;
34 private TranslationDeform _deform;
38 private bool _rootPlate = true;
42 private bool _alreadyStep = false;
43
47 private void Start()
48 {
49 _interactable = GetComponent<Interactable>();
50 _deform = GetComponent<TranslationDeform>();
51 if (_deform != null)
52 {
53 _deform.enabled = false;
54 foreach (var cp in _deform.controlPoints)
55 {
56 cp.gameObject.SetActive(false);
57 }
58 }
59
60 _interactable.onAttachedToHand += CreateCopy;
61 _interactable.onAttachedToHand += EnableControlPoints;
62 _interactable.onDetachedFromHand += DisableControlPoints;
63 _interactable.onDetachedFromHand += CheckAndAddStep;
64 }
65
70 private void CheckAndAddStep(Hand hand)
71 {
72 if (_rootPlate) return;
73
74 CaseController caseController = FindObjectOfType<CaseController>();
75
76 Transform patient = caseController.loadedPatient.transform;
77 if (patient == null) return;
78
79 transform.parent = patient;
80
81 if (_alreadyStep) return;
82 caseController.AddStep(gameObject);
83 _alreadyStep = true;
84 }
85
90 private void CreateCopy(Hand hand)
91 {
92 if (!_rootPlate) return;
93 Instantiate(gameObject, transform.position, transform.rotation);
94 _rootPlate = false;
95 }
96
101 private void EnableControlPoints(Hand hand)
102 {
103 if (_deform == null) return;
104
105 _deform.enabled = true;
106 foreach (var point in _deform.controlPoints)
107 {
108 point.gameObject.SetActive(true);
109 }
110 }
111
116 private void DisableControlPoints(Hand hand)
117 {
118 if (_deform == null) return;
119
120 _deform.enabled = false;
121 foreach (var point in _deform.controlPoints)
122 {
123 point.gameObject.SetActive(false);
124 point.SetParent(transform);
125 }
126 }
127 }
128}
